question: In which nation "Poas Volcano National Park" is located?
explanation: Poas Volcano National Park is located in Costa Rica. It was established in 1971. It is managed by the National System of Conservation Areas. Due to its frequent water vapour and sulphuric gas emissions, this park will be closed frequently for tourists. Poas Volcano is a stratovolcano located in the Cordillera Central parent mountain range of Costa Rica. It is 2708 metres above sea level. The last eruption of the volcano happened in April 2017.
